title.narrative: Citizen Engagement for Delivery of Accountable Public Services

description.narrative: To improve the delivery of public services (health, education and WASH) in response to the needs of the poor and marginalised by providing local communities with the information and tools to lead advocacy and build partnerships with public authorities for accountable service delivery. This will benefit 2.2 million people in selected districts and improve the quality, accessibility and responsiveness of public services particularly for the poor and marginalised. This contributes to our MDG support to Sierra Leone, particularly MDGs 1-5, by delivering critical public services to the poorest and most marginalised and contribute to a reduction in poverty by 2018.
